bibl.title: "After Polotsky". New Research and Trends in Egyptian and Coptic Linguistics. Proceedings of the Conference in Memory of the 100th Birthday of Hans Jakob Polotsky (1905-1991), in Bad Honnef near Bonn, 9th-11th September 2005"
bibl.seg: "Verena M. Lepper (ed.), in collaboration with Peter Nagel & Wolfgang Schenkel, "After Polotsky". New Research and Trends in Egyptian and Coptic Linguistics. Proceedings of the Conference in Memory of the 100th Birthday of Hans Jakob Polotsky (1905-1991), in Bad Honnef near Bonn, 9th-11th September 2005 = Lingua Aegyptia 14 (2006)."
